language.title: Preferred Language
language.description: The language that Cline should use for communication.

telemetry.tooltip: This setting is managed by your organization's remote configuration
telemetry.description: Help improve Cline by sending usage data and error reports. No code, prompts, or personal information are ever sent. See our {telemetryLink} and {privacyLink} for more details.

apiProvider.label: API Provider
apiProvider.remoteConfigTooltip: Provider options are managed by your organization's remote configuration

subagents.title: Subagents
subagents.cliRequired: Cline for CLI is required for subagents. Install it with:
subagents.authDescription: To authenticate with Cline or configure an API provider.
subagents.description: Allows Cline to spawn subprocesses to handle focused tasks like exploring large codebases, keeping your main context clean.

checkpoints.title: Enable Checkpoints
checkpoints.description: Enables extension to save checkpoints of workspace throughout the task. Uses git under the hood which may not work well with large workspaces.

mcpDisplay.title: MCP Display Mode
mcpDisplay.description: Controls how MCP responses are displayed: plain text, rich formatting with links/images, or markdown rendering.

openaiReasoning.title: OpenAI Reasoning Effort
openaiReasoning.description: Reasoning effort for the OpenAI family of models(applies to all OpenAI model providers)

strictPlanMode.title: Enable strict plan mode
strictPlanMode.description: Enforces strict tool use while in plan mode, preventing file edits.

focusChain.title: Enable Focus Chain
focusChain.description: Enables enhanced task progress tracking and automatic focus chain list management throughout tasks.
focusChain.reminderDescription: Interval (in messages) to remind Cline about its focus chain checklist (1-100). Lower values provide more frequent reminders.

dictation.title: Enable Dictation
dictation.description: Enables speech-to-text transcription using your Cline account. Uses the Aqua Voice's Avalon model, at $0.0065 credits per minute of audio processed. 5 minutes max per message.

autoCompact.title: Enable Auto Compact
autoCompact.description: Enables advanced context management system which uses LLM based condensing for next-gen models.

webTools.title: Enable Cline Web Tools
webTools.description: Enables websearch and webfetch tools while using the Cline provider.

nativeToolCall.title: Enable Native Tool Call
nativeToolCall.description: Uses the model's native tool calling API instead of XML-based tool parsing. This will improve performance for supported models.

parallelToolCalling.title: Enable Parallel Tool Calling
parallelToolCalling.description: Allows models to call multiple tools in a single response. Automatically enabled for GPT-5 models.

backgroundEdit.title: Enable Background Edit
backgroundEdit.description: Allows editing files in background without opening the diff view in editor.

multiRootWorkspace.title: Enable Multi-Root Workspace
multiRootWorkspace.description: Allows cline to work across multiple workspaces.

hooks.title: Enable Hooks
hooks.windowsWarning: Hooks are not yet supported on Windows. This feature is currently available on macOS and Linux only.
hooks.description: Allows execution of hooks from .clinerules/hooks/ directory.

skills.title: Enable Skills
skills.description: Enables Skills for reusable, on-demand agent instructions from .cline/skills/ directories.

yoloMode.title: Enable YOLO Mode
yoloMode.remoteConfigTooltip: This setting is managed by your organization's remote configuration
yoloMode.warning: EXPERIMENTAL & DANGEROUS: This mode disables safety checks and user confirmations. Cline will automatically approve all actions without asking. Use with extreme caution.

welcome.title: Welcome to Cline
welcome.subtitle: Your AI coding assistant

description.part1: I can do all kinds of tasks thanks to breakthroughs in
description.part2: agentic coding capabilities and access to tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use a browser, and execute terminal commands
description.part3: I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.

welcome.signupPrompt: Sign up for an account to get started for free, or use an API key that provides access to models like Claude Sonnet.

homeHeader.title: What can I do for you?
homeHeader.tooltip: I can develop software step-by-step by editing files, exploring projects, running commands, and using browsers. I can even extend my capabilities with MCP tools to assist beyond basic code completion.

tooltips.lockedOrganization: This cannot be changed while your organization has remote configuration enabled.

welcome.description: Sign up for a free Cline account to get started with AI coding assistance.
welcome.termsAndPrivacy: By signing up, you agree to our {termsLink} and {privacyLink}.

thinking.label: Thinking ({tokens} tokens)
thinking.notSupported: Thinking not supported by this model
thinking.disabled: Enable extended thinking for enhanced reasoning

splitMode.tooltip: Use different models for Plan vs Act

chatTextArea.placeholderHint: Type @ for context, / for slash commands & workflows, hold shift to drag in files/images

modeToggle.plan: In Plan mode, Cline will gather information to architect a plan
modeToggle.act: In Act mode, Cline will complete the task immediately

windowsPowershell.message: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

errorRow.diffError: The model used search patterns that don't match anything in the file. Retrying...

modal.description: Let Cline take these actions without asking for approval
